name: Dark Drop
description: Dark theme for Drop. Previously Massdrop.
additional_info:
07/17/19 - General fix for dark theme
04/29/19 - Applied dark theme to Drop
12/9/18 - Cleaned up some of the white backgrounds
11/22/18 - Changed the dark green to something more readable
css:
